thread.title: Dr. Mark D. Woodhull
thread.title_full: Trident University reviewed by Dr. Mark D. Woodhull

author: Dr. Mark D. Woodhull
title: Dr. Mark D. Woodhull
text: My hard earned PhD in Business Administration in 2006 zoomed my second career in academia. The rigorous program provided me with solid credentials and expertise that was need to be successful in my discipline. I enjoyed every second of my experience at Trident University International. Several years later 2011, I returned to Trident and earned a master degree in information technology management. I've progressed from new PhD graduate to Director of a business & technology graduate school in Texas. Trident University comes with my highest recommendations.
